name: Zesty Lemon Vinaigrette
description: A bright and well-balanced vinaigrette that will perk up so many kinds of lunches.
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp (30 mL) white wine vinegar2 tbsp (30 mL) strained fresh lemon juice 1 tsp (5 mL) grated lemon rind1 tsp (5 mL) honey¼ cup (60 mL) extra virgin olive oil Salt and freshly ground black pepper
recipeInstructions: Combine vinegar, lemon juice, rind, honey and olive oil in a small jar and shake to emulsify. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
